description:
"This module extends the basic concepts of enterprise risk
management by focusing on the use of technology to
facilitate the identification of key risk indicators and near
misses. Through the use of hands-on laboratory sessions
and case studies, the module will have a special emphasis
on identifying key risk indicators and near misses on social
media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter and blogs.
The analysis of sentiments on these platforms will be used
to illustrate the link of these sentiments to the identification
and prediction of key risk indicators and near misses."
title: Seminars in Accounting: Risk Management Technology
prerequisite: Depends on the particular stream offered. It is envisaged that completion of one or more ACC3xxx modules will be a pre-requisite in most cases.
